name: Project BC
description:
Project BC is base on a fictonal time of 1940s, With world war 2 on the rise, you play as two soldiers Jack Maxewll and Lucas Flame protecting the fictional city of borrow creek, from the enemy army, as your job of the defenec batalion you must recapture the bases from borrow creek but something unatural will arise to cause havoc to the city.

WASD = movement

Mouse1 = shoot

Q/E or 1/2 to switch weapons

Esc to exit the game

R to restart

right now it's just a prototype from my game dev journey and it's my 2nd one by myself but a first non game jam game. feel free to hit me as many feed back needed bad or good cause i defiently need to push futher to make this game reailty.
